summary: After two sailors are conned into buying a lame race-horse, they go ashore to sort out the problem, but when they realize that the horse is one of a pair of identical twins, their plan for revenge becomes more complicated.
cast: Groucho Marx|Marie Wilson|William Bendix|Don DeFore|Gene Lockhart|Dee Hartford|Hanley Stafford|Teddy Hart|Percy Helton|George E. Stone|George Barrows|Brooks Benedict|Dan Bernaducci|Barbara Blaine|Helen Blizard|Sue Carlton|Jack Chefe|Henry Corden|Wade Crosby|George Dockstader|Anne Dore|Don Forbes|Robert Haines|Kenner G. Kemp|Mike Lally|Virginia Linden|Teddy Mangean|Allen Mathews|Al Murphy|Jonni Paris|Richard Reeves|Al Rhein|Julian Rivero|Bob Rose|Don Ross|Ralph Sanford|Jack Santoro|Alex Sharp|Jack Shea|George Sherwood|Bill Slack|Amzie Strickland|Charles Sullivan|Terry Terrill|Midge Ware|Lillian West|Chili Williams|Dave Willock|Rodney Wooton
title: Una novia en cada puerto
